Ye <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3126>mammon<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5210>Ye<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> they which <S%G1344>justify<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> that which is highly <S%G5308>esteemed<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G946>abomination<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846><s%> he <S%G5455>cried<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G911>dip<s%> the <S%G206>tip<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1147>finger<s%> in <S%G5204>water<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2711>cool<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> I am <S%G3600>tormented<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5395>flame<s%>.
